column68: Auditor responsible for auditing the financial statements<br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"/>Our objectives are to obtain reasonable assurance about whether the financial statements as a whole are free from material misstatement, whether due to fraud or error, and to issue an auditorâs report that includes our opinion. column69: Management's responsibility for the financial statements<br xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"/>Management is responsible for the preparation and fair presentation of financial statements in conformity with the Danish Financial Statements Act.
